B.title: Lesson 1: I want (eggs), please.
B.intro: Let's meet our new friends, Felix and Cleo. They are brother and sister, and they are twins! They are five years old. How old are you? Wow! Good job. Now. I'm hungry. What's for breakfast?
B.dialog:
Mom: What do you want?
Cleo: I want eggs, please.
